text: bahudevaradhakaru ‘‘ondu vele allahanu hage bayasiddare, navagali nam'ma purvajaragali avana horatu bere yarannu pujisuttiralilla mattu avaru avana adesavillade yavudannu nisid'dhavendu pariganisuttiralilla’’ ennuttare. Avariginta hindinavaru higeye madiddaru. Eniddaru, dutarugalige, spastavagi (sandesa) talupisuva horatu bere honegarike ideye
